title: Find the Period
text: For the standard tangent function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{\pi}{1}=pi$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard tangent function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{\frac{\pi}{2}}{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}$$
